contest-event.event-date:
Jan. 29, 2017 D Brass At The Guild (Preston) Contest (Championship Section)
Brass At The Guild (Preston) Contest (Championship Section) 1 Own Choice from a Specified List Brass at the Guild (Preston) brass-at-the-guild-preston-contest-championship
Pageantry
Guild Hall (Grand Hall), Preston, Lancashire, England, UK Best soloist - Ian Culross (Cornet)Milnrow. Best euphonium - Simon Willis (Hatfield). Best Basses - Hatfield. 9 bands competed.
Test piece could be 'Pageantry' (Herbert Howells) or that band's own choice from the Butlins Mineworkers contest. All bands played 'Pageantry'.
Dec. 9, 2016, 2:10 a.m. March 11, 2017, 6:28 p.m.
1 Hatfield Band Stan Lippeatt
2 Milnrow Band Matthew Brown
3 Wingates Band Paul Andrews
4 Longridge Band Mark Peacock
5 City of Bradford Brass Band Lee Skipsey
6 Hepworth Band Leigh Baker
7 Thoresby Colliery Ian McElligott
8 Blidworth Welfare Band Martin Heartfield
9 Easington Colliery Band Ian Robinson
